bike.description: S-Works FACT 11r, aero tube shape, FACT IS construction, compact race design, internal cable routing, 1 3/8" lower HS bearing, OS carbon BB shell

components.description: S-Works FACT carbon, Uni-weave, full monocoque, OS race for 1 3/8" bearing
1 1/8 upper and 1 3/8 lower Cr-Mo cartridge bearings w/ custom Venge spacer
Carbon chain stay protector, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual
